definition: to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating

sentences.english: Twelve enemy transport aircraft on the handstand were knocked out by mortar shells.
sentences.chinese: 停機坪上的十二架敵方運輸機被迫擊炮彈擊毀了。

sentences.english: Indian jawans retaliated after mortars were fired from the Pakistani side.
sentences.chinese: 巴方發起迫擊炮襲擊後，印度士兵開始報復。

sentences.english: The streets are blasted with the thick black residue of mortar attacks.
sentences.chinese: 路面沾滿了迫擊炮轟炸後留下的又黑又厚的痕跡。

sentences.english: A few mortar shells were landing somewhere with a flat thudding sound.
sentences.chinese: 不知哪裏落了幾顆迫擊炮彈，悶聲悶氣地轟轟幾響。

sentences.english: The mortar position should be protected from direct-fire weapons as best as possible.
sentences.chinese: 迫擊炮位應儘量避開敵軍直接火力打擊。

sentences.english: The mortar ammo bearers should provide security to the gun team.
sentences.chinese: 迫擊炮炮彈搬運兵應擔負起炮組的保衛任務。

sentences.english: The Hedgehog was actually a group of whirling dervish sort of bombs fired ahead of the attacking ship.
sentences.chinese: “刺蝟”實際上就是向船的前方前發射迫擊炮彈。

sentences.english: When you were in the Guards mortars , did you have anti-aircraft cover?
sentences.chinese: 當你在近衛迫擊炮部隊時，有高射炮掩護嗎？

sentences.english: A mortar and pestle was first used to pulverize the granules of Ignition Powder .
sentences.chinese: 迫擊炮和杵首次用來粉碎的顆粒點火粉末。

sentences.english: Were 50 mm company mortars any good?
sentences.chinese: 連屬50毫米迫擊炮怎麼樣？

sentences.english: The enemy was mortaring a crossroads behind us.
sentences.chinese: 敵人正用迫擊炮轟擊我們背後的一個十字路口。

sentences.english: You get to use the mortar aimpoint on the map.
sentences.chinese: 你開始使用地圖上的迫擊炮瞄準點。

sentences.english: Make use of Pitbulls to assist with clearing the skies and defeating clumps of infantry with the mortar.
sentences.chinese: 使用鬥犬輔助清除空軍，並用迫擊炮打擊大堆得步兵。

sentences.english: At other times they were stopped by mortars shells and machine-gun fire.
sentences.chinese: 另有幾次，他們被迫擊炮和機槍火力阻止停了下來。

sentences.english: The radar will be able to detect the firing of mortar shells at Israeli territory.
sentences.chinese: 該雷達可以探測到向以色列境內發射的迫擊炮彈。

sentences.english: Some [of the mortars] hit in our street.
sentences.chinese: 一些迫擊炮擊中我們這條街。
